name: Pingtan Marine Enterprise Ltd.
description: Pingtan Marine Enterprise Ltd. is a leading fishing company based in China, specializing in the operation of a fleet of modern fishing vessels. Founded in 1993, the company has established itself as a significant player in the seafood industry, focusing on deep-sea fishing activities. Pingtan operates its fishing fleet primarily in the Indian and Western Pacific Oceans, targeting a diverse range of fish species, including squid, mackerel, and other high-demand seafood. The company's commitment to sustainable fishing practices is evident in its adherence to international regulations and standards aimed at preserving marine ecosystems. Pingtan has also expanded its operations to include processing and distribution of seafood products, allowing it to capitalize on growing global demand. With a strategic focus on innovation and efficiency, Pingtan continually seeks to enhance its operational capabilities and broaden its market reach. The company aims to contribute to food security while ensuring responsible fishing practices that benefit both the economy and the environment.

seo.meta_title: Pingtan Marine Enterprise Ltd. | Sustainable Fishing and Seafood
seo.meta_description: Explore Pingtan Marine Enterprise Ltd., a leader in sustainable fishing and seafood processing. Discover our commitment to responsible marine practices and product quality.

faq.question: What does Pingtan Marine Enterprise do?
faq.answer: Pingtan Marine Enterprise engages in deep-sea fishing and seafood processing.

faq.question: Where is Pingtan Marine headquartered?
faq.answer: Pingtan Marine is headquartered in Fuzhou, Fujian, China.

faq.question: What types of seafood does Pingtan Marine offer?
faq.answer: Pingtan Marine offers a variety of seafood products, including squid, mackerel, and pollock.
